channel.title: Graphics
channel.description:
I'm looking for another GFX / graphic artist to make a few requests of mine for my project. I do have a long-term position open if interested and I like your work, just let me know I will also pay you every month for your works, and requests of mine you complete throughout the month.
I basically just need a new logo, or two, and a "I Support FoHammer" signature. If you're interested in completeing more work for me, we'll talk futhermore, thanks.
[u][b]Required:[/b][/u] You must be able to provide a clean piece of work.
[u][b]Contact me via skype:[/b][/u] im2high2behere

item.title: Graphics

item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

I’m looking for another GFX / graphic artist to make a few requests of mine for my project.
I do have a long-term position open if interested and I like your work, just let me know I will also pay you every month for your works, and requests of mine you complete throughout the month.

I basically just need a new logo, or two, and a “I Support FoHammer” signature.
If you’re interested in completeing more work for me, we’ll talk futhermore, thanks.
